div.p: [I greet my … and] my brother Pasion with his wife and children; I greet Ptollemon (?) with his wife and children; I greet Sanpas with his wife and children; I also greet your wife many times; I did not find anybody, who was travelling, so that you could send me news about your safety …
To [.... ]nios, the brother … From Sanpas Translation: F. Hamouda, P.Cair.Mich. 2 20
